edu.ncsu.csc216.checkout_simulator.simulation

Class Simulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.checkout_simulator.simulation.Simulator

  • public class Simulator
extends java.lang.Object
    This class runs the carts from the beginning of the register line to the front checkout location.
    Author:
    premsubedi

      double averageProcessTime()
      Returns average number of seconds that carts spent in checking out.
      double averageWaitTime()
      Returns average number of seconds carts had to wait in checkout register lines prior to actually checking out.

      Returns color of a current cart being checking out

      Index of CheckoutRegister selected by the currentCart, Or -1 if currentCart is null.

      Returns total number of steps that were already taken
      boolean itemLeftSimulation()
      Returns true if the most recently handled cart completed checking out and left a register line, false otherwise.

      Returns true if the simulation has not yet finished, false if it has

    • Constructor Detail

      • Simulator

        public Simulator(int numberOfRegisters,
                 int numberOfCarts)
        Class constructor that initializes/constructs it's fields
        Parameters:
        numberOfRegisters - total number of registers in a store
        numberOfCarts - total number of carts generated by cart factory
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when the number of register are out of bound [3, 12]
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when the number of carts are less than zero.

        Sets valid number of registers
        Parameters:
        numRegister - number of register.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the number of carts is less than 3 or more than 12.

      • moreSteps

        public boolean moreSteps()
        Returns true if the simulation has not yet finished, false if it has
        Returns:
        myLog.getNumCompleted() < numCarts if total carts completed is less than number of carts.

      • totalNumberOfSteps

        public int totalNumberOfSteps()
        Returns total number of steps taken during checkout
        Returns:
        numCarts*2 total number of steps for numCarts

      • getCurrentCartColor

        Returns color of a current cart being checking out
        Returns:
        currentCart.getColor() color of the current cart.

      • itemLeftSimulation

        public boolean itemLeftSimulation()
        Returns true if the most recently handled cart completed checking out and left a register line, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        !currentCart.isWaitingInRegisterLine() if the cart left

      • getCurrentIndex

        public int getCurrentIndex()

        currentCart.getRegisterIndex() index of the register
